conbody.p: Using DITA can be intimidating at first, even for those who have experience with markup languages like HTML. oXygen XML has several features that make authoring much easier:

ul.li: oXygen automatically inserts DOCTYPE declarations at the beginning of files
oXygen XML provides definitions of each tag
The author view toolbar is reminiscent of Microsoft Word, most users will easily recognize many functions

li.p: oXygen XML automatically populates some attributes for tags such as note type

ul.li: oXygen XML immediately alerts the user of syntax errors with a red underline
